subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand, products and services.

faqs.question: What is the relationship between Spryker and CommerceQuest?
faqs.answer: CommerceQuest was created by the Spryker Community team, to be able to broaden our scope beyond just Spryker software discussion. Today we help our community with their quests in commerce in general and with Spryker, Oryx and Propel in particular.

faqs.question: What does CommerceQuest offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a platform for online (Meetups, Forum) and offline (User Groups, Hackathons, Conferences) communication and collaboration for Spryker, Oryx and Propel users.

faqs.question: Do I need to be an active member?
faqs.answer: Nope, you can just be a lurker and ask questions in our forum ðŸ˜Š. If you want, you can always become more active in answering questions, participating in events or even organizing a community event. You decide what you want to do.

faqs.question: Who is your target audience?
faqs.answer: Most of our users have a technical background: software developers, engineers, architects etc. But we also have a mix of other roles joining regularly like project managers, UX designers or other business users.

faqs.question: How current are the online resources and tutorials?
faqs.answer: We regularly update our online resources and tutorials to reflect the latest trends, as well as post introductions to new tools and techniques. Our material aims to be comprehensive and user-friendly for all skill levels. And the great thing is that most of it is available to you on Github so if you see something that needs to be updated you can do so yourself and send in a PR!
